thread.title: Jones to start at QB for Steelers; Patriots RB Lewis to miss game vs. Jets
thread.title_full: Jones to start at QB for Steelers; Patriots RB Lewis to miss game vs. Jets

title: Jones to start at QB for Steelers; Patriots RB Lewis to miss game vs. Jets
text:
Landry Jones gets the start for the Steelers. (Photo: ASSOCIATED PRESS)
2 CONNECT 7 TWEET 1 LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE As expected, Landry Jones will make the start at QB for the Steelers.
Coach Mike Tomlin told Stacey Dales of CBS Sports that he will go with Jones, and Ben Roethlisberger will be inactive for today's game vs. Kansas City.
In other notable injury news for Week 7:
- Patriots RB Dion Lewis (abdomen) is inactive for game vs. Jets.
- Vikings RB Adrian Peterson was downgraded to questionable (illness) on Saturday, but NFL Network reported Sunday morning Peterson is expected to play.
- ICYMI on Saturday: Cowboys have said WR Dez Bryant is out.
